content: पराभवः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Defeat, discomfiture, overthrow; पराभवोऽप्युत्सव एव मानिनां <ls>Ki. 1. 41.</ls> ({%b%}) Mortification, humiliation; कुबेरस्य मनः शल्यं शंसतीव पराभवं <ls>Ku. 2. 22</ls>; तव पदपल्लववैरिपराभवमिदमनुभवतु सुवेशं <ls>Gīt. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Contempt, disregard, disrespect. {@--3@} Destruction. {@--4@} Disappearance, separation (sometimes written पराभाव).
